content: this easy-level pattern is perfect for crocheters looking to create a charming 3-dimensional angel figure the pattern is worked in the round from the top down resulting in a 6-inch tall and 5 25-inch wide finished angel with clear written instructions even beginners can enjoy making this heavenly creation the grace angel pattern is a must-have for any crochet enthusiast seeking a fun and rewarding project **unique features-** easy-level pattern suitable for beginners crochet amigurumi design for a 3-dimensional angel figure worked in the round from the top down clear written instructions for seamless crafting experience finished size 6 inches tall and 5 25 inches wide **materials needed-** yarn red heart super saver solids in aran 57 yards hook 4mm us size 6 0 gauge 4 stitches by 4 row = 1 inches **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern
